remarks: The zeta series is convergent.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2014.)
statement:
zetacvg.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. CC ) $.
zetacvg.2 $e |- ( ph -> 1 < ( Re ` S ) ) $.
zetacvg.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN ) -> ( F ` k ) = ( k ^c -u S ) ) $.
zetacvg $p |- ( ph -> seq 1 ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
$d F k $.
$d S k $.
$d k ph $.
